LeadingCast.name: Jane Smith
LeadingCast.description: A versatile actress celebrated for her roles in critically acclaimed dramas, Jane Smith takes on a challenging role in "Midnight Echo," delivering a performance that will leave audiences breathless.

LeadingCast.name: John Brown
LeadingCast.description: With a career spanning blockbuster hits and indie gems, John Brown brings intensity and depth to his role, making his character unforgettable.
